findings.title: burnTokens() sends burn amount to burnAddress
findings.description: The function burnTokens() sends the burn amount to burnAddress.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude themselves from paying fees.

findings.title: Manager can transfer management to new address
findings.description: The manager has the privilege to transfer management to a new address.

findings.title: Manager can change router
findings.description: The manager has the privilege to change the router, which could lead to unauthorized modifications.

findings.title: Manager can withdraw contract BNBs
findings.description: The manager has the privilege to withdraw contract BNBs without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has privileges to lock and unlock, allowing them to retake ownership even after renouncing it.
